author: tom
description:
Description: A Python interface to communicate with DS9Homepage URL: http://hea-www.harvard.edu/RD/ds9/The pyds9 module uses a Python interface to XPA
to communicate with DS9. This includes not only sending data and settings to DS9, but also retrieving them into Python.  This package comes from the developers of ds9 and XPA.
title: pyds9
